name: Momo Call Me Scary Horror Game
name_original: Momo Call Me Scary Horror Game
description:
Be careful, Momo is in your house.
Survive till police arrive, don't worry police is on his way.

Follow the instructions to stay alive otherwise Momo will kill you.
Learn how to survive in horrifying and deadly situations.

Features:

Dreadful Environment.
Horrifying Sounds.
Interesting game story.
